subject: Football
Trades (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Buffalo Bills — not known for making risky moves on big-name players — signed the mercurial Terrell Owens to a one-year contract believed to be worth $6.5 million.
snippet: The Buffalo Bills — not known for making risky moves on big-name players — signed the mercurial Terrell Owens to a one-year contract believed to be worth $6.5 million.
